JoinRequestDialog.title: Wɔ ɖeka kple xɔa .
JoinRequestDialog.inviteOnly: Esia nye ame ŋutɔ ƒe xɔ eye wòbia amekpekpewo be woawɔ ɖeka .
JoinRequestDialog.knockRequired: Xɔ sia bia be woawɔ dɔ le eme hafi woate ŋu awɔ ɖeka kplii. Zi dzesi si le ete dzi be nàɖo join biabia la ɖa .
JoinRequestDialog.canJoin: Esia nye dutoƒoxɔ, àte ŋu awɔ ɖeka tẽ .
JoinRequestDialog.sendRequest: Ðo kpe ɖe eŋu ƒe biabiawo .

MessageList.noMessages: Gbedasi aɖeke meli haɖe o, ɖo gbedasi gbãtɔ ɖa be nàdze dzeɖoɖoa gɔme!

error.loadFailed: Do kpo gbedasi la tsɔtsɔ de eme .

MessageList.historyEnd: Nya gbãtɔ si wogblɔ la va ɖo .

MessageVirturalList.noMessages: Gbedasi aɖeke meli haɖe o, ɖo gbedasi gbãtɔ ɖa be nàdze dzeɖoɖoa gɔme!

RoomMembers.title: Xɔa me tɔwo .
RoomMembers.noMembers: Hamevi aɖeke mele eme haɖe o .
